abilities.name: Flaming Shot
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {R} Energy card from your hand. If you do, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Backfire
attacks.effect: Put 2 {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand.

attacks.name: Massive Heat Wave GX
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
